alternatives.name: FULLY
ste_example: THE SYSTEM IS FULLY AUTOMATIC.
nonste_example: The system is wholly automatic.

note.value: Use a different construction.
note.ste_example: THE GENERATORS SUPPLY A THREE-PHASE VOLTAGE. THE FREQUENCY OF THIS VOLTAGE INCREASES WHEN THE GENERATOR ROTOR SPEED INCREASES.
note.nonste_example: The generators produce a three-phase voltage whose frequency is proportional to the generator rotor speed.

meanings.value: That has a specified or large width
meanings.ste_example: REPAIR ALL CRACKS THAT ARE WIDER THAN 0,05 mm.

meanings.value: The smaller of two dimensions, the second-largest of three dimensions
meanings.ste_example: MEASURE THE WIDTH OF THE CRACK AT THE WIDEST POINT.

meanings.value: Auxiliary modal verb that shows simple future tense
meanings.ste_example: WARNINGS AND CAUTIONS IN THIS MANUAL WILL HELP YOU TO DO THE WORK SAFELY AND CORRECTLY.

note.value: No other verb forms.

meanings.value: To move around and around an object
meanings.ste_example: WIND THE TAPE ON THE REEL.

alternatives.name: WIND
ste_example: WHEN THERE ARE STRONG WINDS, OBEY THESE SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS.
nonste_example: Take special precautions in very windy conditions.

alternatives.name: CLEAN
ste_example: BEFORE EACH CYCLE, CLEAN THE INDICATOR.
nonste_example: Wipe the indicator surfaces before each cycle.

meanings.value: ATTACH (v) (WITH WIRE [TN])
meanings.ste_example: ATTACH THE HOSE TO THE FIXTURE WITH WIRE.
meanings.nonste_example: Wire the hose to the fixture.

meanings.value: LOCK (v) (WITH LOCKWIRE [TN])
meanings.ste_example: LOCK THE FOUR BOLTS TO EACH OTHER WITH LOCKWIRE.
meanings.nonste_example: Wire-lock the four bolts to each other.

meanings.value: SAFETY (v) (WITH SAFETY WIRE [TN])
meanings.ste_example: SAFETY THE FOUR BOLTS TO EACH OTHER WITH SAFETY WIRE.
meanings.nonste_example: Wire-lock the four bolts to each other.

meanings.value: Function word that shows association or relationship, help or sharing, a means or instrument
meanings.ste_example: ALIGN THE MARK WITH THE LONGITUDINAL AXIS.
ATTACH THE FLANGE (10) WITH THE FOUR BOLTS (15).
REMOVE THE VALVE (2) WITH THE EXTRACTOR.

note.value: Refer to section 9, GR-2.

alternatives.name: REMOVE
ste_example: REMOVE THE INDICATOR FROM THE INSTRUMENT PANEL.
nonste_example: Withdraw the indicator from the instrument panel.

alternatives.name: IN
ste_example: A FILTER PREVENTS CONTAMINATION OF THE COMPONENTS IN THE SYSTEM.
nonste_example: A filter prevents contamination of the components within the system.

alternatives.name: IN ... OR LESS
ste_example: LIGHT L4 COMES ON IN 5 SECONDS OR LESS.
nonste_example: Light L4 illuminates within 5 seconds.

alternatives.name: IN LESS THAN
ste_example: MAKE SURE THAT THE WARNING LIGHT COMES ON IN LESS THAN 3 SECONDS.
nonste_example: Make sure that the warning light illuminates within 3 seconds.

meanings.value: Not with
meanings.ste_example: SMALL DAMAGE IS PERMITTED WITHOUT REPAIR. REFER TO TABLE 1 FOR THE APPLICABLE LIMITS.

alternatives.name: RESISTANT
ste_example: THIS MATERIAL IS RESISTANT TO FIRE.
nonste_example: This material can withstand fire.

meanings.value: That which you do when you use physical strength, or mental power
meanings.ste_example: DO THE WORK IN A CLEAN AREA.

alternatives.name: WORK
ste_example: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU DO WORK NEAR FUEL TANKS.
nonste_example: Be careful when you work near fuel tanks.

alternatives.name: CAN
ste_example: SOLVENTS THAT STAY ON THE PART CAN CAUSE CORROSION.
nonste_example: Solvents left on the part would corrode the part.

alternatives.name: PUT
ste_example: PUT THE PART IN OILPAPER.
nonste_example: Wrap the part in oilpaper.

alternatives.name: WIND
ste_example: WIND MASKING TAPE AROUND THE PART.
nonste_example: Wrap masking tape around the part.

meanings.value: To record data or information as words, letters, or symbols
meanings.ste_example: WRITE THE TEST DATE ON THE CERTIFICATE.

alternatives.name: INCORRECT
ste_example: IDENTIFY THE BELLCRANK AND SHAFT WITH MARKS. THESE MARKS WILL PREVENT AN INCORRECT INSTALLATION.
nonste_example: Mark the bellcrank and shaft to prevent wrong installation.

alternatives.name: INCORRECTLY
ste_example: IF THE HOSES ARE INCORRECTLY INSTALLED, DAMAGE CAN OCCUR.
nonste_example: Damage can occur if hoses are wrongly installed.

meanings.value: Function word that shows the positive answer to a question
meanings.ste_example: DOES THE LIGHT COME ON? YES OR NO?

alternatives.name: BUT
ste_example: TIGHTEN THE NUTS, BUT KEEP THEM SUFFICIENTLY LOOSE TO REMOVE THEM WITH YOUR HAND.
nonste_example: The nuts should be tightened, yet loose enough to remove by hand.

alternatives.name: AT THIS TIME
ste_example: DO NOT REMOVE THE FIXTURE COVER AT THIS TIME.
nonste_example: Do not remove the fixture cover yet.

meanings.value: The reader or the user
meanings.ste_example: YOU CAN CONTINUE THE TEST.
HOT SURFACES CAN BURN YOU.

meanings.value: Related to the reader or the user
meanings.ste_example: IF YOU GET SOLVENT IN YOUR EYES, FLUSH THEM IMMEDIATELY WITH WATER.

alternatives.name: YOU
ste_example: DO NOT USE YOUR HANDS TO PREVENT MOVEMENT OF THE LP COMPRESSOR. IF YOU DO, THE LP COMPRESSOR CAN CAUSE YOU INJURY AND CAN CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE EQUIPMENT.
nonste_example: Do not use your hands to prevent movement of the LP compressor. If you do, you can cause injury to yourself and damage to the equipment.

alternatives.name: ZERO
ste_example: ADJUST THE METER TO ZERO.
nonste_example: Zero the meter.
